relation: No dorms, it's a community college.
Classes are sometimes challenging, it just depends what classes you take.
Make sure to get as many units as you can if you want to finish your degree and transfer within two years.
The campus of Cerritos college is beautiful, and their stadium is amazing. Every teacher I've had has been willing to go the extra mile to help students. The class selection is amazing as well.

textAfterTable: Jasmine from Paramount, CA 12/08/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 5 people found this review useful. 2 of 65 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Cerritos is great for all students who are interested in taking a few classes, getting their AA degree, or receiving a certification. If you're looking for a school to complete your general education requirements I highly recommend Cerritos. It has the highest number of transfer students which means more people can transfer out and pursue their education. Tips for prospective students For all the students who are planning to attend Cerritos I highly recommend that you register as soon as possible. When it comes to enrollment choose your classes wisely and pick the classes you want to take ahead of time so that when it comes time to enroll it can be done fast and easy.
